data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Cedric Gogoua (Volgograd) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 3, Artem Dzyuba is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Artem Dzyuba is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 5, Saint Petersburg's Viacheslav Karavaev breaks free at Zenit Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Zenit Stadium.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for Volgograd, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
In the minute 11, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the away team a throw-in.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Volgograd a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 17, Saint Petersburg are coming forward and Yaroslav Rakitskiy gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 20, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Throw-in Volgograd.
Goal! Artem Dzyuba gives Saint Petersburg a 0-1 lead in Volgograd.
In the minute 22, Sebastian Driussi instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Volgograd drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 26, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Volgograd needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 30, In Volgograd Volgograd drive forward through Kamil Mullin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
Malcom of Saint Petersburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
In the minute 36, Anton Piskunov (Volgograd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
In the minute 39, Volgograd's Anton Piskunov misses with an attempt on goal.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Saint Petersburg's Viacheslav Karavaev has been booked in Volgograd.
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Artem Dzyuba's header is off-target for Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Volgograd throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Zenit Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Zenit Stadium.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Zenit Stadium, Danil Stepanov has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 52, Saint Petersburg pushes forward through Yaroslav Rakitskiy, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Volgograd's half?
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In the minute 54, Kamil Mullin for Volgograd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Volgograd.
Saint Petersburg drives forward and Sebastian Driussi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 55, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Volgograd throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 58, Free kick in a good position for Saint Petersburg!
Saint Petersburg push upfield but Alexey Valerievich Matyunin quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 60, Saint Petersburg's Sardar Azmoun is whistled for offside at Zenit Stadium.
Volgograd have a dangerous throw-in.
Volgograd's Danil Stepanov is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Volgograd.
Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 63, Volgograd's Mukhammad Sultonov gets in a shot on goal at Zenit Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The home team have replaced Evgeniy Pesegov with Ilya Zhigulev. This is the first substitution made today by Aleksandr Khatskevich.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
In the minute 65, Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Volgograd are pushing forward but Mukhammad Sultonov's finish is wide of the goal.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Throw-in high up the field for Volgograd in Volgograd.
In Volgograd Volgograd attack through Kamil Mullin. The finish is off target, however.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Volgograd throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 70, Sergey Serchenkov is replacing Kamil Mullin for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
Emiliano Rigoni is on a sub for Sardar Azmoun for Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg make their second substitution with Yuri Zhirkov replacing Malcom.
In the minute 72, Volgograd have a dangerous throw-in.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Yaroslav Rakitskiy gets his shot on target but fails to score for Saint Petersburg.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
In the minute 79, Goal! Sebastian Driussi extends Saint Petersburg's lead to 0-2.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for Saint Petersburg, close to Volgograd's area.
Oleg Nikolaev is replacing Azat Bairyyev for the home team.
In the minute 82, Aleksandr Khatskevich (Volgograd) is making a fourth substitution, with Beka Mikeltadze replacing Mukhammad Sultonov.
The away team replace Wilmar Barrios with Leon Musaev.
Daniil Krugovoy is on a sub for Douglas Santos for Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 83, Saint Petersburg's Sebastian Driussi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Volgograd defender.
Can Volgograd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 86, Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Sergey Semak is making the team's fifth substitution at Zenit Stadium with Andrey Mostovoy replacing Sebastian Driussi.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Volgograd a goal kick.
At Zenit Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Volgogradâ€™s Cedric Gogoua is on his feet again at Zenit Stadium.
Saint Petersburg's Yuri Zhirkov misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Sergey Serchenkov of Volgograd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin waits before resuming play because Cedric Gogoua for Volgograd is still down.
